=> Mayo Clinic(https://www.mayoclinic.org/):
 Mayo Clinic is a nonprofit American academic medical center focused on integrated clinical practice, education, and research. Their website provides reliable health information and resources.

 =>WebMD (https://www.webmd.com/):
WebMD is a well-known health information website that covers a wide range of topics. It offers articles, news, expert opinions, and interactive tools for users.


=>Centers for Disease Control and Prevention(https://www.cdc.gov/):
The CDC is a leading national public health institute in the United States. Their website offers authoritative information on various health topics, including diseases, vaccines, and public health guidelines.


=>Harvard Health Publishing(health.harvard.edu):
Harvard Health Publishing provides health information from experts at Harvard Medical School. The content is evidence-based and reviewed by medical professionals.


=>National Institutes of Health(https://www.nih.gov/):
The NIH is a U.S. government agency that conducts and supports medical research. Their website offers a wealth of information on health topics, clinical trials, and research findings.


=>World Health Organization(https://www.who.int/y):
The World Health Organization is a specialized agency of the United Nations focusing on international public health. Their website provides global health information and resources.
